Ping.name: 핑
Ping.desc: Returns the ping to the channel

Stats.name: Stats
Stats.desc: Provides global statistics about PUBG Companion

Info.name: Info
Info.desc: Gets infomation about a specific user or the current server

Invite.name: Invite
Invite.desc: Provides infomation about inviting PUBG Companion to a server

Support.name: Support
Support.desc: Gets a link to my support hub/server

Updates.name: Updates
Updates.desc: Retrieves infomation about PUBG Companion's latest update from her support hub

Announce.name: Announce
Announce.desc:
Makes an announcement to the specified channel
**Requires:** manage messages

pubg.name: PUBG Player Stats
pubg.desc: Shows the stats of a PUBG player of your choice
pubg.example:
p!pubg YouAreBread -pc-krjp lm
Shows the last match of the user YouAreBread on PC, in the Korea/Japan region.
